annotations.description: There was no time for the supporters to get bored during the game as it was full of action and thrilling moments. We saw a very balanced game over the 90 minutes. The home team played long ball football unlike the away side who attempted to hold onto the ball for as long as possible.

annotations.description: That's it for today, Mark Clattenburg has blown his whistle and the game is over.
Craig Dawson (West Brom) sends a cross into the box, but Thibaut Courtois comes off his line to gather the ball.
It's a throw in for West Brom.

Jonas Olsson (West Brom) reacts well and displays good awareness inside the box to get on the end of the resulting corner kick. He fails to direct the ball into the net as it flies narrowly over the crossbar.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Serge Gnabry (West Brom) takes the ball to the corner flag and sends it into the box.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: 5 min. of stoppage time to be played.
Serge Gnabry (West Brom) commits a rough challenge and Mark Clattenburg blows his whistle for a foul. Chelsea are awarded a free kick. Let's see what they create from this.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Substitution. James Morrison makes his way off the pitch and Craig Gardner (West Brom) comes on as his replacement.
Chris Brunt (West Brom) creates a good chance for himself and goes for goal from mid range, but it's just a bit too high and misses the bar by a whisker.
Eden Hazard (Chelsea) amazingly found his way through the defence, but lacked a precise finish as his effort from close range went slightly wide of the right post.
Serge Gnabry (West Brom) shoots from the edge of the penalty area. The ball travels low towards the middle of the target, but Thibaut Courtois easily deals with the threat.
Chris Brunt (West Brom) sends a lofted cross into the penalty area. Unfortunately for him, the opponent's defence deals with his cross comfortably and intercepts it.
A fine lofted pass into the box, sent by Darren Fletcher (West Brom), is intercepted by the opposition's defence.

annotations.description: Substitution. John Obi Mikel (Chelsea) replaces Pedro.

The defence is alert as they clear a dangerous cross from Craig Dawson (West Brom). The ball goes out for a corner. West Brom can continue in their attacking effort.
Pedro sprays a pass out to Falcao (Chelsea), but he produces a poor effort from inside the box which goes well wide of the left post.

annotations.label: substitution

annotations.label: corner

annotations.label: injury
annotations.description: Branislav Ivanovic (Chelsea) is clearly asking for some medical attention with his painful gestures. The extent of his injury is yet to be discovered.
Jose Rondon (West Brom) receives a precise pass on the edge of the box and shoots. His poorly placed shot flies well wide of the left post.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: West Brom take the corner, but their hopes of scoring a goal end with nice clearance by the defence.

Nemanja Matic (Chelsea) gives away a foul for a fierce tackle on an opponent.
A pass by Craig Dawson (West Brom) ends up in no man's land, and the attacking effort comes to an end.
Craig Dawson (West Brom) sends over a cross, but he can't find any teammate inside the box. Poor delivery.
Diego Costa (Chelsea) gets on the end of a cross from Pedro, but his shot goes a whisker wide of the left post.
West Brom are seeing far more of the ball now.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and James McClean departs the field of play to be replaced by Rickie Lambert (West Brom).

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: What a finish! James Morrison (West Brom) leaps high to meet a perfect cross from Callum McManaman and scores with a bullet header from around the penalty spot. His effort is planted precisely off the crossbar into the roof of the net, leaving Thibaut Courtois beaten. The score is now 1:3.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Pedro (Chelsea) launches a powerful cross from the corner into the box, but the ball is intercepted by the defender.

Nemanja Matic (Chelsea) stands over the free kick and opts to take it himself, sending the ball towards the bottom right corner only for Glyn Oliver Myhill to dive and make a save. The ball goes out of play. Chelsea are awarded a corner kick.

Jonas Olsson (West Brom) should know this behaviour is beyond the rules. He was too careless with his challenge and left Mark Clattenburg no option but to blow his whistle. Chelsea are given an advantage. They have a free kick.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The second half has just started.

Both sides have been very active in the first half, providing the fans with an exciting show. The visitors are mostly controlling the match and making it tough for the home side to keep up. The home side are attempting to create scoring opportunities mainly with long balls, while the away team are trying to prevail using combination football.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The end of the first half.
The defence had a hard time blocking out the strike from Cesar Azpilicueta (Chelsea). He didn't hesitate and finished from outside the box right after he had received a pass from his teammate.
The free kick is taken by Cesc Fabregas (Chelsea), but ball is cleared.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: We will have 2 min. of added time.
Mark Clattenburg has a clear sight and sees a foul from Claudio Yacob (West Brom).

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal 1:3! Cesar Azpilicueta (Chelsea) gets a shot away from the edge of the box and scores into the bottom left corner. Diego Costa provided an assist for the goal.

Golden chance! Willian (Chelsea) meets a cross in the box and finds some space for a shot. He produces an inaccurate effort that goes wide of the right post. The ball is off of the pitch and it's a goal kick for West Brom.
Willian (Chelsea) latched on to a good low pass and attempted to surprise the goalkeeper with a snap shot, but the ball skewed off his foot flew well over the bar.
Darren Fletcher (West Brom) serves up a nice cross, but Thibaut Courtois punches the ball away.

annotations.description: Cesc Fabregas (Chelsea) takes the corner but fails to find any of his teammates.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: James McClean (West Brom) can't expect anything else than a yellow card for his hard tackle. And a yellow it is. Mark Clattenburg didn't think twice about pulling it out of his pocket.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal! Jose Rondon displays great vision and sends a pass to James Morrison (West Brom), who shows brilliant composure inside the box to bury the ball into the back of the net. The score is 1:2.
Chris Brunt (West Brom) flights in the cross, but the defender is alert and clears to safety.
Chelsea exchange some short passes over a small area and control the game. Now they make a mistake and lose the ball and the whole situation changes completely.

Willian (Chelsea) dribbled past his opponents before finding himself in a great position to strike. His attempt from just outside of the box went towards the bottom right corner, but it wasn't dangerous and Glyn Oliver Myhill made a comfortable save.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal! Diego Costa (Chelsea) scores after an assist by Pedro that allowed him to tap in the ball into an empty net. The score is 0:2.

annotations.label: penalty-missed

James Morrison (West Brom) is heading towards the penalty spot to take it.

annotations.label: penalty
annotations.description: Nemanja Matic (Chelsea) brings his opponent down. Mark Clattenburg has a clear sight of it and blows his whistle for a foul. That's a penalty to West Brom! They have a good chance to score now.

An attempted cross from Branislav Ivanovic (Chelsea) is cleared.
Some great controlled play and passing from Chelsea. They are increasing their possession of the ball and trying to open up the opposition's defence to hit them swiftly on the break.

Diego Costa (Chelsea) weaves through the defence with ease and gets into a good position in front of goal. He pulls the trigger in an effort to beat the keeper, but fails as the ball zooms around the right post.
Craig Dawson (West Brom) sends a chip pass into the box, but Thibaut Courtois is quickest to intercept the ball.
The ball is out of play. West Brom will have a throw in.
